name: Space Game v0.1.4
description:
release log:

  • 02/07: build 0.1.1 released
    • Story intro added plus redesigned hud elements. Go check it out!
  • 07/07: build 0.1.2 released!
    • Major changes to combat system & game HUD
  • 12/07: build 0.1.3 released!
    • Added combat skills and randomized enemy stats. Enemies now have armor. Lots of combat bugs fixed!
  • 28/07: build 0.1.4 released!*NEW*
    • New sexy HUD! Added enemies combat panels. Enemies now have skills and can level up while in battle!

-------------

Important info:

This game is in a very early stage of development.

As of build 0.1.4 you can only explore a small test level with 3 enemies already coded.

-------------

Devlog @ www.joaovasconcelos.pt
